column5: Planning a trip to the NW Angle mid-June. Looking for Good walleye and smallmouth spots close to the NW Angle Also looking how to obtain a map of the area. First trip and want to be kinda prepared for a great trip.Thanks
Go to the "Fishing Reports" board and look for a message titled "NW Angle Fishing" authored by David A. This thread has some good tips and locations for where you are going. Have a good trip.Fuzz
